data.text: @octoberwho @mental_floss He’s not asking for money. There is a rule of a 5-year wait after death. He’s suggesting fans write & ask them to override the rule to allow her a star sooner, timed to ep IX release. It takes many requests to override a rule. https://t.co/L6etmL3xEd

@LavLobster @mental_floss So my understanding in correct, a “group” pays for it... so Mark has access to multiple groups that could nominate Carrie and he could then pay for the star... just not getting why him/Lucas or Carrie’s brother doesn’t make this happen if it’s something she would have wanted...
@mental_floss 5 years wait for a posthumous star?  That's ridiculous.
@mental_floss We are all of us Stars & we deserve to twinkle ✨ ~M. Monroe
@octoberwho @mental_floss A group pays for the star but they still have to be granted permission by the Hollywood Chamber of Commerce to place it there. It’s not rubber-stamped.
@mental_floss Replace Trump's with Carrie's Star @HamillHimself ! https://t.co/A01qqvq7JQ
@mental_floss I thought you just had to buy one... could Mark Hamill do this himself?
